p: Plant material used in this study were dried herbal parts (bilberry fruits and leaves), collected at Bjelasica Mountain, Montenegro. The voucher specimens (No VMF_121215, and VML_111215) were deposited at the Faculty of Pharmacy, Department of Botany, University of Belgrade, where the identification was performed. Shortly before the extraction, leaves were ground in an electric mill (all samples powdered, dimension of the particles 355, as recommended in the European Pharmacopoeia 9.0 [ 8]). The seeds were separated from the pulp, washed in water, and dried before extraction.
